name: person_id
description: PMI-specific ID generated by the RDR and used for tracking/linking participant data.

name: first_name
description: The first name of the participant.

name: middle_name
description: The middle name of the participant.

name: last_name
description: The last name of the participant.

name: street_address
description: Line 1 of the street address the participant lives at.

name: street_address2
description: Line 2 of the street address the participant lives at.

name: city
description: The city the participant lives in.

name: state
description: The state the participant lives in.

name: zip_code
description: The postal zip code of the participant.

name: phone_number
description: The phone number of the participant.

name: email
description: The email address participant provided to register.

name: date_of_birth
description: The day the participant was born.
